Hepatitis A (Tests for hepatitis A virus Nucleic Acid)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    7904-6 Hepatitis A virus RNA [Presence] in Serum by NAA with probe detection
    89373-5 Hepatitis A virus genotype in Unspecified specimen by NAA with probe detection
    91070-3 Hepatitis A virus RNA [Presence] in Stool by NAA with probe detection
